definitions.definition: a person, a company or a country that grows or makes food, goods or materials

examples.text: Libya is a major oil producer.
one of the world's largest meat producers
organic producers of meat, eggs and dairy products

definitions.definition: a person who is in charge of the practical and financial aspects of making a film or play

examples.text: He is an **executive producer** of the film.

definitions.definition: a person or company that arranges for somebody to make a programme for radio or television, or a record, CD, etc.

examples.text: He's been a top producer and mixer for the past decade.
the legendary music producer Quincy Jones
